title: Judge Walker Miller Memorial Endowed Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship support to a CU Law School student who demonstrates the spirit of Judge Walker Miller.  This includes academic excellence and coming from modest means.  Preference will be given to a student from rural Colorado.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship support to a CU Law School student who demonstrates the spirit of Judge Walker Miller.  This includes academic excellence and coming from modest means.  Preference will be given to a student from rural Colorado.
